item.title: Don't touch that
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: Don’t touch that Have you ever been told “don’t touch that, if you modify that piece of code you are going to break anything”? How did you react to this comment? Did you feel “attacked” or simply ignored that piece of advice? Code jungle Starting a working on a project that has some dark corners is a daunting task but following some guidelines can be useful. Scary code There is always some scary code, I do not mean code that is difficult to understand, but code that has unintended consequences if modified.
